title: payload_attributes SSE event implementation incomplete
body:
The SSE `payload_attributes` event is implemented incompletely/incorrectly:

* https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/12102
* Spec: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/blob/master/apis/eventstream/index.yaml#L95-L124

What's missing?

1. `Data` should be lowercase `data`
2. It needs to send the event also on missed slots (which is extremely important for both relays and block builders)

Example event subscription:

```
event: payload_attributes
data: {"version":"capella","Data":{"proposer_index":"19787","proposal_slot":"314103","parent_block_number":"299439","parent_block_root":"0xe1cc821c3e9358c01dfd9eb57f14a7e98101331312036ee1a39c96be79b8a04f","parent_block_hash":"0x87a643ec8ffe37dd5d7e3c0902f3f0e30fbd05622d54104180432edcd73d074d","payload_attributes_v2":{"timestamp":"1679032836","prev_randao":"0x5ffb7964815f1ce6b45389f0dc306652707f619f1b8231b497400bdd83ce7f50","suggested_fee_recipient":"0x8dc847af872947ac18d5d63fa646eb65d4d99560","withdrawals":[{"index":"4075007","validator_index":"48352","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296320"},{"index":"4075008","validator_index":"48353","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075009","validator_index":"48354","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296879"},{"index":"4075010","validator_index":"48355","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296879"},{"index":"4075011","validator_index":"48356","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"288711"},{"index":"4075012","validator_index":"48357","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075013","validator_index":"48358","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"297164"},{"index":"4075014","validator_index":"48359","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296879"},{"index":"4075015","validator_index":"48360","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075016","validator_index":"48361","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"297164"},{"index":"4075017","validator_index":"48362","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"289272"},{"index":"4075018","validator_index":"48363","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296879"},{"index":"4075019","validator_index":"48364","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075020","validator_index":"48365","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"297164"},{"index":"4075021","validator_index":"48366","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"297164"},{"index":"4075022","validator_index":"48367","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"}]}}}

event: payload_attributes
data: {"version":"capella","Data":{"proposer_index":"6005","proposal_slot":"314105","parent_block_number":"299440","parent_block_root":"0x91f4e3079ee2fd2cdfa27ebff370bd810d632f01387dbf583b6e00d3dcb50667","parent_block_hash":"0x04ac0e5acaaca713b91ca4cdcd391df975a7f6ed7149ddde2996860349a1480a","payload_attributes_v2":{"timestamp":"1679032860","prev_randao":"0xcc2e195b67fc1e549b1aced3cdebf8669a7c319f60d6bd7dffb880892ba5e748","suggested_fee_recipient":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","withdrawals":[{"index":"4075023","validator_index":"48368","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"297164"},{"index":"4075024","validator_index":"48369","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075025","validator_index":"48370","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296884"},{"index":"4075026","validator_index":"48371","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"297164"},{"index":"4075027","validator_index":"48372","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296320"},{"index":"4075028","validator_index":"48373","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075029","validator_index":"48374","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296325"},{"index":"4075030","validator_index":"48375","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"289552"},{"index":"4075031","validator_index":"48376","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"297164"},{"index":"4075032","validator_index":"48377","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"289272"},{"index":"4075033","validator_index":"48378","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"281389"},{"index":"4075034","validator_index":"48379","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"280545"},{"index":"4075035","validator_index":"48380","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075036","validator_index":"48381","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296320"},{"index":"4075037","validator_index":"48382","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"304491"},{"index":"4075038","validator_index":"48383","address":"0xf97e180c050e5ab072211ad2c213eb5aee4df134","amount":"296879"}]}}}
```

It's a bit time critical, because for the Capella fork we currently require both relays and builders to run a custom Prysm fork, and using the SSE event would any relay and builder to work with upstream Prysm and we could remove the fork for good. 

But there's only little time until the mainnet Capella fork (3.5 weeks), and we need some time to implement, test and roll out with enough lead-time for other relays to be able to do the same.
@metachris in case of missed slots you would want the event to be triggered at 4 seconds? Then if a block arrives late you'd get another one, does this sound good?
I think 4 seconds are a reasonable default. I think it'd best be configurable unless it's a lot of work
